title: STOP GIVING RIOT OUR MONEY
body:
Fix the tribunal/report system and don't just give us skins and new looking UI.

How things looks visually should come second to the gaming experience.

I refuse to pay riot a cent for anything until something is done!

stand with me people if you really enjoy this game but wish trolls/toxic players should be dealt with

replies.body:
"It's easy for us to look at a broken system, and say its broken. It's becomes significantly harder when we're asked to fix it." - Unknown

If you've got a suggestion for improving the community, please suggest it. Posts that point out flaws everyone knows [and yes, i believe Riot has been trying to fix the attitude of the community for awhile now] don't help significantly. Posts that suggest resolutions are really beneficial though. :)

If you're interested in following the discussions around player behaviour, theres a lot of them that have happened over the past few years. Look at Riot Lyte's discussions.

The assumption being that it's one or the other, when in actuality it's both at the same time because, you know, the artists don't work on the player behaviour systems...

Learn your sh!t before complaining about it.
But I want an irelia skin..  How can I get an irelia skin that an artist (who has zero skill or knowledge in tribunal systems or coding or anything ) slaved over if I don't spend money?

having to mute everyone at the start of the game just to have a good game is ridiculous.

how are we suppose to make internet friends and have a good time without worrying about toxic players that don't bother to use common sense or act like a part of society

what makes you think the artist has 0 knowledge of the game?

that's not the point anyway.

if we don't start somewhere and make it an issue for riot then nothing will change.

sure the artist makes profit but riot makes even more profit off the artist and players.

riot is the big problem so let's tackle that
i didn't say i w as an expert in how the company functions i just have a lot of first hand experiences with how bad the gaming experience can get playing this game
